content:
Does anyone here have MySQL 8 available for testing (locally)?

It seems like their version 8.0.22 brought a problematic change with REGEXP. See https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4931 for details. The first comment contains steps to verify.

FileUploadTransliterationTest fails under Ubuntu 20.04 路 Issue #4931 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug One test fails under Ubuntu 20.04 that does not fail under Debian 9 (php 7.0, MariaDB 10.1.47). It may be a configuration or database issue. Database is using default char se...

Does anyone here have MySQL 8 available for testing?

I do now (temporarily). So if anyone needs some MySQL 8 issues tested, just ask. (I can also provide Backdrop admin access.)
